headline: PulteGroup Promotes Norman Brown to Southern California Division President
summary: ATLANTA, June 16, 2025--PulteGroup (NYSE: PHM), today announced the promotion of Norman Brown to president of its Southern California division. With nearly 23 years of experience with the Company, Brown will lead all aspects of the division’s homebuilding operations. In 2024, PulteGroup’s Southern California division generated homebuilding revenues of approximately $850 million.
